actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A resolution to declare the preservation of our soil, water, and wildlife water resources of the highest national priority.

summary.text: Calls for a combined effort by the Government and private sector, with the aid of economic incentives, to attain the objectives of land and water conservation. Specifies that efforts should be taken to conserve and expand the shelterbelts and windbreaks in the Great Plains and other areas of the Nation.

titles.title: A resolution to declare the preservation of our soil, water, and wildlife water resources of the highest national priority.
